fields.where: Garage - Clue is hidden in the black storage areas above head, near entrance so they don't have to walk far
fields.location_hint1: Here, we use and store ancient power

fields.location_hint3: I miss Henry, my old roommate that stayed in the bedroom downstairs.

fields.where: Guest Bedroom - Clue is tapped to the bottom side of the closet shelf
fields.location_hint1: A pretty good place to store a skeleton

fields.where: PhD Diploma - Tapped onto the (back of the) frame
fields.location_hint2: I see so much black, yet, I know, on the other side, there is a rainbow
Height isn't everything - but some of it definitely isn't bad

fields.where: Front side of whiteboard in a corner
fields.location_hint3: Go into the living room and read the rules & regulations of this game

fields.where: Tapped to the top of the recycling lid - The side that says classified or sci or whatever
fields.location_hint1: You'll need a clearance to view me
fields.location_hint2: I consume metal but never glass

fields.where: Laundry room - on the wall behind shelves of the raspberry pi server

fields.location_hint3: "A silent hum where the circuits pulse, Seek the shadows where the secrets convulse. The distance hides where the echoes play, Look beyond the surface to uncover the way." - ChatGPT 4o mini

fields.location_hint2: Round and round - with some beeps thrown in
fields.location_hint3: Taste the rainbow - but maybe don't

fields.where: Underneath the rug in the living room
fields.location_hint1: Where daughter and man's best friend becomes one

fields.location_hint1: I am fuel for the human body
fields.location_hint2: I hold the essentials, spices, and more, often tucked away behind a closed door.
fields.location_hint3: I give The Boss life on a daily basis. He often cares a cup with my name on it.

fields.location_hint2: Everything the light touches can be yours, but you will need base access to get there

fields.where: Underneath the front door porch mat (inside):
fields.location_hint2: I am first to see you and last to leave

fields.where: Fan switch in living room (small letter tapped to it)
